availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Warren and Allen County, Kentucky, farmer. Warren County native. Married Frances Dixson Moore on November 21, 1837. Father of Hosea S. Frances Moore. Married Malinda Blackburn Moore on September 12, 1841. Children included John B., Asbury G. Tilman, Frances J. Moore, Henry M. Moore, and Thomas C Moore. Farmer, carpenter, and blacksmith. Member of the Baptist church. Magistrate and member of the Court of Claims of Allen County for six years. Lived in Washington County, Illinois from 1839 to 1844.

ab.bibl: J. H. Battle, W. H. Perrin, & G. C. Kniffin, Kentucky: A History of the State, 3rd ed. (Louisville: F. A. Battey and Company, 1887), 747.
